newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - CFI ProServices Inc.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - CFI ProServices Inc.

text.p: --Hambrecht and Quist analyst James Pettit said he downgraded CFI ProServices Inc to a hold from a buy, citing uncertainty about the company's growth rate in the end of 1997 and 1998.
--"Due to a combination of lower revenue and higher than expected expenses, the company has given guidance to no higher than $0.20 for Q3 verus our original estimate of $0.32."
--"We are lowering our 1997 and 1998 EPS estimates from $1.20 and $1.55 to $1.03 and $1.30, with $0.15 in Q3-97."

--"While we are generally positive about CFI's long term franchise, we believe that there is limited upside in the stock over the next several months until the company has proven it can perform against the revised expectations."
--CFI ProServices makes PC-based software solutions that automate customer service and support functions in the financial service industry.
